verses.verse: And <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> will <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H4503>meat<s%> <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> and he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> and he shall <S%H7061>take<s%> <S%H4480>therefrom<s%> <S%H8033><s%> his <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H7062><s%> of the <S%H4480>flour<s%> <S%H5560><s%> thereof, and of the <S%H4480>oil<s%> <S%H8081><s%> thereof, <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> thereof; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it upon the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> to be an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the <S%H3498>remnant<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons':<s%> it is a thing most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H4480>fire.<s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H3989>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven,<s%> it shall be <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> thy <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> baked <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H4227>pan,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H6626>part<s%> it in <S%H6595>pieces,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a meat <S%H4503>offering.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> thy <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> baked in the frying <S%H4802>pan,<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> of these <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H428><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and when it is <S%H7126>presented<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> it <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7311>take<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof, and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And that which is <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons':<s%> it is a thing most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H4480>fire.<s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7603>leaven,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> in any offering of the LORD made by <S%H801>fire.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>

As for the <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of the <S%H7225>firstfruits,<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> them unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5927>burnt<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of thy meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shalt thou <S%H4414>season<s%> with <S%H4417>salt;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou suffer the <S%H4417>salt<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%> to be <S%H7673>lacking<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy meat <S%H4503>offering:<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H7133>offerings<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> thou <S%H7126>offer<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of thy <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> for the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of thy <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> green ears of <S%H24>corn<s%> <S%H7033>dried<s%> by the <S%H784>fire,<s%> even corn <S%H1643>beaten<s%> out of full <S%H3759>ears.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a meat <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it, part of the beaten <S%H4480>corn<s%> <S%H1643><s%> thereof, and part of the <S%H4480>oil<s%> <S%H8081><s%> thereof, <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> thereof: it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
